pages.about: About Urban Oasis Mumbai - Our Journey, Philosophy, and Commitment Contact About us Casino About Urban Oasis Mumbai - Our Journey, Philosophy, and Commitment Our Journey Urban Oasis Mumbai was born from a vision to create a sanctuary of tranquility amidst the vibrant energy of India's financial capital. Founded in 2010 by hospitality visionary Arjun Mehta, our hotel has evolved from a boutique establishment to a beacon of luxury and comfort in Mumbai. Our journey has been one of constant innovation and improvement. We've meticulously refined every aspect of our service, from our room designs to our dining experiences. Each year, we've added new features and services based on guest feedback and emerging hospitality trends. Our recent expansion in 2022 introduced our award-winning rooftop infinity pool and wellness center, further cementing our status as Mumbai's premier urban retreat. Our Philosophy At Urban Oasis, we believe that true luxury lies in the perfect balance of comfort, authenticity, and personalized service. Our philosophy is rooted in three core principles: Tranquility in the City: We strive to offer a peaceful haven that contrasts with and complements Mumbai's dynamic atmosphere. Cultural Authenticity: We aim to provide our guests with genuine experiences that reflect Mumbai's rich cultural tapestry. Sustainable Luxury: We are committed to delivering world-class luxury while minimizing our environmental impact through sustainable practices. Book Your Urban Retreat Experience the Urban Oasis difference for yourself. Our dedicated team is ready to make your stay in Mumbai unforgettable. Whether you're here for business or leisure, we promise an experience that combines the best of modern luxury with authentic Indian hospitality. Book Now Our Commitment to Excellence At Urban Oasis, we believe that our staff is our greatest asset. Our commitment to providing exceptional service begins with our comprehensive training and development programs. New team members undergo an intensive six-week induction program, covering everything from hotel operations to Mumbai's cultural heritage. This ensures they can provide informed, authentic experiences to our guests. We also prioritize continuous learning. Our staff participates in monthly workshops led by industry experts, covering topics such as emerging hospitality trends, cultural sensitivity, and advanced customer service techniques. Furthermore, we've implemented a unique mentorship program where seasoned staff members guide newer employees, fostering a culture of knowledge sharing and personal growth. Our investment in our team's development is reflected in our service. Whether you need assistance with travel plans, have dietary requirements, or simply need recommendations for exploring Mumbai, our well-trained staff is always ready to exceed your expectations. At Urban Oasis, we don't just train employees; we nurture hospitality professionals who are passionate about creating memorable experiences for our guests. Disclaimer Terms conditions Privacy policy Phone: +9134225336455 E-mail: urbanoasis@gmail.com Contact About us Casino © 2024 Urban Oasis

pages.privacy-policy: Urban Oasis Privacy Policy - Protecting Your Data with Care Contact About us Casino Urban Oasis Privacy Policy - Protecting Your Data with Care Privacy Policy At Urban Oasis, we are dedicated to protecting the privacy and security of our guests. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard the personal information you provide to us, both online and offline. Information We Collect We may collect various types of personal information from you, including: Contact information (e.g., name, email address, phone number, mailing address) Demographic data (e.g., age, gender, preferences) Reservation and stay details (e.g., dates, room preferences, payment information) Feedback and correspondence (e.g., surveys, customer service interactions) Technical information (e.g., IP address, browser type, device information) We collect this information to provide you with exceptional service, personalize your experience, and improve our offerings. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect to: Process and manage your hotel reservations and stay Respond to your inquiries, requests, and feedback Personalize your experience and tailor our services to your preferences Communicate with you about our products, services, and special offers Analyze and improve our operations, marketing, and customer service Comply with legal and regulatory requirements Data Security and Retention We take the security of your personal information seriously. We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, disclosure, or misuse. This includes the use of encryption, access controls, and other security protocols. We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. Sharing Your Information We may share your personal information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our business, such as payment processors, marketing agencies, and IT service providers. These third parties are contractually obligated to protect the confidentiality and security of your information. We may also disclose your information to comply with legal requirements, protect our rights and property, or in the event of a corporate transaction, such as a merger or sale. Your Rights and Choices You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information, as well as the right to object to or restrict certain processing of your data. To exercise these rights or if you have any questions or concerns about our privacy practices, please contact us at urbanoasis@gmail.com. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or applicable laws. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated policy on our website or through other appropriate communication channels. By using our services or providing us with your personal information, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy. We appreciate your trust and are committed to protecting your privacy. Disclaimer Terms conditions Privacy policy Phone: +9134225336455 E-mail: urbanoasis@gmail.com Contact About us Casino © 2024 Urban Oasis
pages.terms-conditions: Urban Oasis Terms and Conditions Contact About us Casino Urban Oasis Terms and Conditions Terms and Conditions Welcome to Urban Oasis, a premier hotel and resort destination in the heart of Mumbai. These terms and conditions ("Terms") govern your use of our website, booking services, and overall experience at our establishment. By accessing our website, making a reservation, or staying at our hotel, you agree to be bound by these Terms. Reservations and Bookings All reservations and bookings made through our website, mobile application, or directly with our hotel are subject to availability and our current rates. We reserve the right to modify our rates and policies at any time. A valid credit card may be required to secure your reservation, and you may be charged a deposit or full payment in advance, depending on the booking type and our current policies. Check-in and Check-out Our standard check-in time is 3:00 PM, and check-out time is 12:00 PM. Early check-in or late check-out may be available upon request and subject to availability, and additional fees may apply. Guests are responsible for ensuring they vacate their rooms by the designated check-out time to avoid additional charges. Cancellations and Refunds Cancellation policies vary based on the booking type and rate selected. Please review the specific cancellation terms at the time of booking. In the event of a cancellation, any refunds will be processed according to our current policies. No-shows or early departures may result in forfeiture of the entire stay. Guest Conduct Guests are expected to behave in a manner that is respectful of other guests and our staff. We reserve the right to refuse service, remove guests, or terminate a stay for any reason, including but not limited to disruptive, illegal, or unethical behavior. Guests may be held responsible for any damages or additional cleaning fees resulting from their actions. Liability and Disclaimer Urban Oasis shall not be liable for any injuries, damages, or losses incurred by guests during their stay, unless directly caused by our negligence or willful misconduct. We are not responsible for the loss or theft of personal belongings, and guests are advised to secure their valuables. We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time, and it is the guest's responsibility to review the current version before each stay. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns regarding these Terms and Conditions, please don't hesitate to contact us at urbanoasis@gmail.com. We are committed to providing you with an exceptional experience and are happy to assist you. By proceeding with your booking or stay at Urban Oasis, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. Disclaimer Terms conditions Privacy policy Phone: +9134225336455 E-mail: urbanoasis@gmail.com Contact About us Casino © 2024 Urban Oasis
